messages.message:
Hi team,

Has anyone encountered this screen before? Just rebased against master and my sandbox is running with no issues.

When i clear cookies I can log in, but after I log in I just see this screen again :thinking_rotating:
Oh yes, please re-run db migration: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mM32cCbi4NFtphnlu1T8rtsc0lsfj3FZWfNrKmui34M/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.uigwvfmjos5m

Seems like it worked, but it looks like I lost some info related to my account.

ex: I already upgraded to commercial, but now don't have my organzation account anymore, and I'm running into this issue when trying to create a new org.
Interesting... can you share your sandbox? I can take a look
Looks like db-migration didn't complete. The permissions table is empty. I'll run it again

Did I miss a step? I ran

```cd $IB_HOME/shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db
bazel run tools/dbschema migrate```
then

```export DB_PARAMS="--dialect=mysql --port=3306 --hostname=mysql --username=root --database=ibdb"
bazel run tools/dbmigrate```
Still looking! give me a minute
OK. Your sandbox should be working now! Can you try again?
Thank you so much! It's working again :slightly_smiling_face:
PR to set the `enable_setup_prebuilt_roles` env var true by default: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71382
